replies.body:
Well it looked like Arizona was going to win 13-20.  Then Green bay threw a hail mary on the last play of the game and scored.  Tieing the game 20-20 going to Overtime.  Then the referees flipped the coin but the coin didnt flip (Find a video, its pretty great lol)  But then Arizon got the ball in overtime and scored to win, not giving Green bay a chance to even play in Overtime

TL:DR hail mary, coin no flip, Green bay go boom boom
replies.body_tagged:

TL:DR hail mary, coin no flip, Green bay go boom boom
